text: All water rents derived from the Washington Aqueduct shall be paid into the General Fund of the District of Columbia as established by the Revenue Funds Availability Act of 1975.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1533.

1973 Ed., § 43-1524.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2401.13.

DC CODE § 34-2401.14

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Payment of water rents from Washington Aqueduct into General Fund.
